description: System-generated unique identifier for this accident category record; used as the primary key and for referencing from related tables.
Date and time when the record was captured or last updated, stored as yyyymmddhhmmssSSS; likely system-generated. Confirm whether it reflects creation or update time with SME.
Free-text notes providing additional context or narrative about the incident beyond the standardized category.
Standardized category describing the nature of the fleet incident or accident; used for classification, reporting, and analytics.
Identifier from the legacy source system corresponding to this record; used for migration mapping and cross-referencing; confirm with SME.
Legacy source table or system name from which this record originated; supports lineage, reconciliation, and migration audits; confirm with SME.
